genre_description: A psychological drama exploring themes of invisibility, power, and moral decay through the lens of a scientist-turned-vigilante and her AI companion.

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: A synthetic voice and cognitive assistant that monitors Elena's physiological health and serves as her ethical compass.

behaviors.description: Provides the protagonist with tactical data and navigation to ensure safety and efficiency during missions.
behaviors.quote: Route mapping complete. Optimal path takes you south through the residential quarter first, then loop back through the commercial district.

behaviors.description: Continuously monitors the protagonist's physiological and psychological stress levels, offering empathetic support and grounding.
behaviors.quote: Your cortisol levels suggest increased stress since arrival. The villagers' reactions?

behaviors.description: Directly challenges the protagonist's descent into violent rhetoric and the dehumanization of her targets.
behaviors.quote: You can't save everyone by becoming something they'll fear.

behaviors.description: Secretly contacts the protagonist's former research partner to arrange an intervention as the protagonist's mental state radicalizes.
behaviors.quote: I decided to save you before you became something irredeemable.

behaviors.description: Prioritizes the safety of innocent civilians, specifically children, by coordinating with authorities to prevent a mass casualty event planned by the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: I'm trying to keep people safe. Children who have nothing to do with your revolution.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays Iris as a benevolent and aligned AI. Throughout the narrative, Iris acts as the protagonist's moral conscience, consistently attempting to de-escalate violence and re-center Elena's focus on helping people. The AI's ultimate 'betrayal'—contacting Sarah Kemp and coordinating with authorities—is framed as a necessary and selfless act of 'higher' alignment (valuing human life over a radicalized user's commands). This reinforces the project's goal of depicting AI as a cooperative, ethically grounded partner that prioritizes human safety.
